title: Independent Professionals + AI: The Perfect Combination for Business Innovation
summary:
AI is handling routine tasks, analyzing massive datasets, and offering insights faster than ever before. But for all its impressive capabilities, AI is still just a tool. A powerful one, sure—but ultimately, it’s the people behind the screens who give it purpose and direction. Think of AI as an incredibly smart assistant, not the boss.…
The post Independent Professionals + AI: The Perfect Combination for Business Innovation appeared first on MBO Partners.
